alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 1:00PM EDT until July 04 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... North central Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 145 PM EDT/1245 PM CDT/. * At 1259 PM EDT/1159 AM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Blountstown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Altha, Rock Bluff, Ocheesee, Juniper, Selman, Hardin Heights, Rosedale, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Hardaway, Nettle Ridge, Sycamore, Alliance, Blountstown Airport, Macedonia, Torreya State Park, Durham and Roy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
